name: hl0cl
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c0, cnv))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈ CHilOLD, c1 ∈ c2, c0 ∈ NrmCVec)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c0, cnv))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c1 ∈ c2)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c0 ∈ NrmCVec)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 ∈ c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c0, cnv))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c1 ∈ c2)
⊣ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c0 ∈ NrmCVec)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 ∈ c2)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c1 ∈ c2)
⊣ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 ∈ c2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cnv), wcel(c1, c2))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cn0v, c0))
body.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ NrmCVec → c1 ∈ c2)
⊣ c2 =(BaseSet ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(0vec ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, chlo), wcel(c1, c2))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cba, c0))
-| wceq(c1, cfv(cn0v, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈ CHilOLD → c1 ∈ c2)
⊣ c2 =(BaseSet ` c0)
⊣ c1 =(0vec ` c0)

comment: The Hilbert space zero vector. (Contributed by NM, 7-Sep-2007.) (New usage is discouraged.)
